document.full_text: a day after palestinian factions signed a unity deal, secretary of state hillary rodham clinton strikingly refused to rule out further negotiations with a palestinian side that includes hamas.
document.title: accord brings new sense of urgency to israeli-palestinian conflict
lines_and_colors: a day after palestinian factions signed a unity deal, secretary of state hillary rodham clinton strikingly refused to rule out further negotiations with a palestinian side that includes hamas.
